statements: DELETE FROM SupplierPerformanceMetrics WHERE supplier_id = 100 AND on_time_delivery < 0.8;
DELETE FROM SupplierPerformanceMetrics WHERE quality >= 0.9 AND supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM Suppliers WHERE active = 1);
DELETE FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE supplier_id = 123 AND on_time_delivery_metric < 0.9;
DELETE FROM supplier_contacts WHERE contact_id IN (SELECT contact_id FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 456);
DELETE FROM delivery_history WHERE delivery_date < '2022-01-01' AND delivery_status = 'Delayed';
DELETE FROM deliveries WHERE supplier_id = 3 AND delivery_id = 5;
DELETE FROM QualityMetrics WHERE supplier_id = 100 AND quality_rating < 4.5;
